title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.10 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.10 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or the application
thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, such invalidity shall
not affect other provisions or applications, and to this end the provisions of
this Part are declared to be severable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6030.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
